newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - OneWave cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - OneWave cut to hold.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Kenneth Burke cut his rating on OneWave Inc to hold from buy after the company "pre-announced" fourth quarter earnings below Burke's estimates.
-- In a statement, Burke said he had expected the company to report sales of $5.8 million and a net loss of $0.01 a share.
-- OneWave said sales would be $2.0-$2.5 million. Using Burke's model, that would mean a loss of $0.25-$0.30 a share.
-- Burke said OneWave offered no specific steps to deal with its problems. He said he would wait to calculate new estimates until fourth quarter figures are reported.
